Keywords: Excalibur , Mystical
Real Name: Elizabeth Braddock
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
ENDURING IN OTHERWORLD: When a friendly character within range and line of fire uses Charge, after resolutions roll a d6. 5-6: Remove an action token from that character.
TENACITY, ALWAYS: Leadership, but succeeds on 4-6. When Captain Britain uses it and succeeds, in addition to normal effects, she may remove an action token from a friendly character within range.

heyodern
She has a little extra kick to her with that charge, given she has a 1-in-3 chance of taking a token off herself, then a token off any teammates that charged in. Then a 50/50 chance to peel those tokens off teammates, all traited. But she'll take a beating at a range.
